reviews.text: A great facility: low cost, friendly staff and I’ve always found it clean and tidy. It’s hard to believe all the negative reviews. I’ve been coming for years, and have used both adult and children’s swimming pools, and the soft play. The kids pool has toys for them to play with. There are clean seating areas in a couple of places which are great for feeding baby. Great to have in the community

Been using this gym for 9 months, what you'd expect from a Leisure Centre. I've used a few Better Gyms and this is not the worst. Half decent equipment and machines and a generous floor space. Obviously very busy during peak times and the weights are usually a mess. 90% of the gym users don't re-rack their weights and I've never seen a staff member try to either.

Shame there’s no zero star. Worse experience I’ve had in a gym in my life and I’ve worked in gyms for 15 years. Spin instructor on Sunday didn’t ask about injuries, was mostly looking at the floor, music louder than central line and no mic. Called me sweetie which I find inappropriate and unprofessional, nothing justifies a bad attitude towards a paying customer. Bikes were filthy and badly maintained. I’m in disbelief about the poor service. Never to be repeated.

I recently had the misfortune of visiting this place, and let me tell you, it was an experience I'd rather forget...

The lifeguards must have been secretly auditioning for the next Olympics because they seemed determined to break the world record for the most stern and uninterested facial expressions.
And don't you dare think about asking for help or guidance. These lifeguards have a zero-tolerance policy for common courtesy. I attempted to seek their assistance once, and their response was colder than the water they were supposedly guarding. Don't expect much assistance or a smile, as their customer service skills could definitely use some improvement.

Now, let's talk about the pool's aesthetic appeal. If you're into swimming alongside an exciting array of floating objects, this place is a paradise for you! And let's not forget about the lovely assortment of floating debris that graced the pool's surface. I've seen cleaner water in a muddy puddle after a heavy rainstorm.

If you're in the mood for a freezing swim in a pool that doubles as a biohazard zone, while being serenaded by lifeguards who've mastered the art of nonchalance, then this leisure center is the place for you. But if you value your hygiene, your comfort, and your sanity, I suggest you run as fast as you can in the opposite direction.

Disgusting! It’s dirty, run down and gross! The swimming pool is FREEZING and dirty. The changing rooms for swimming are mixed but the majority of cubicles don’t have working locks on the doors. UPDATE: I’ve since had a “reply” on my review. Are you going to reply to every single review with the same issues of cleanliness and pool temperature and basically call them liars? Are we all wrong ?

address: Cathall Rd, London E11 4LA, United Kingdom
